Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.controllers

Class BookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.controllers.BookController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/books")
@CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class BookController
extends java.lang.Object
    Book controller

    This class is responsible for handling GET, PUT, POST and DELETE requests.

    The book controller is being mapped under the /books path. The controller can only work with Json objects

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    Book, BookService, BookRepository

    • Method Detail

      • getBookByISBN

        @GetMapping("/{ISBN}")
public Book getBookByISBN​(@PathVariable
                          java.lang.Long ISBN)
        GET Mapping for Book using ISBN

        Allows to retrieve a book by its ISBN from the central database.

        Implementation Note:
        A book may be accessed by calling /books/012345 where the number in the path is the ISBN of the book to retrieve
        Parameters:
        ISBN - path variable ID of the book to retrieve
        Returns:
        Book by its corresponding ISBN

      • getAllBooks

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<Book> getAllBooks​(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                        java.lang.Long authID,
                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                        java.lang.String title,
                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                        java.lang.Boolean forKids,
                                        @RequestParam(required=false)
                                        java.lang.Integer publishYear)
        GET Mapping for Book

        Allows to retrieve a list of books based on request parameters. All the parameters are optional and one may select any number of them in any order in the request.

        Parameters:
        authID - Optional request parameter to filter books with author ID
        title - Optional request parameter to filter by title containing a keyword
        forKids - Optional request parameter to filter books that are meant for kids or not
        publishYear - Optional request parameter to filter books by publish year
        Returns:
        List of found books based on the request parameters

      • addNewBook

        @PostMapping(consumes="application/json")
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
public Book addNewBook​(@RequestBody
                       Book b)
        POST Mapping for Books

        Allows to add a new Book to the database using Json.

        Implementation Note:
        A new book may be provided in the request body of the POST request in Json format under the path /books.
        Parameters:
        b - Book to add to the database in Json format from the request body
        Returns:
        Book copy of the newly saved book if succeeded

      • deleteBook

        @DeleteMapping("/{ISBN}")
@ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT)
public void deleteBook​(@PathVariable
                       java.lang.Long ISBN)
        DELETE Mapping for Book

        Allows to delete an existing book using its ISBN

        Implementation Note:
        A book may be deleter under /books/012345 where the number in the path is the ISBN of the book to delete
        Parameters:
        ISBN - path variable ID of the book to delete

      • updateBook

        @PutMapping("/{ISBN}")
public Book updateBook​(@PathVariable
                       java.lang.Long ISBN,
                       @RequestBody
                       Book b)
        PUT Mapping for Book

        Allows to update an existing book's details using its corresponding ISBN

        Implementation Note:
        A book may be updated under the path /books/012345 where the number in the path is the ID of the book to update. A request body containing the same ISBN must be present as well!
        Parameters:
        ISBN - path variable ID of the existing book to update
        b - Json formatted book in the request body with the updated details containing the ISBN
        Returns:
        Book copy of the saved and updated book if succeeded
